post.body: "Learn to be Happy w/ what you Have While you Pursue what you Want" Jim Rohn*Sounds Easy?Make Efforts to apply it everyday,Ur Mind WILL CHNG
QUOTATIONS,they make me stop & think about my life,what's good & what's to be workd on,Relationships,Success,I'll share my favorite with you
U know the compasionnate story of Edwarda O'Bara? I Invite you to go check their website: http://www.edwardaobara.com/, Dr Wayne Dyer'sbook
I just figured out we can't write more than 140 caracters at a time!!! Or...is there another way?!!
Seems like people use this social network to: talk about themselves, give profesionnal advices & tips, discuss business, FUN, networking...
What to write on Twitter?! I'm checking out your profiles to give me an idea, be the best you can be...Well that should be every day! : )
Back from CA,I learned a couple things when you ask advices from people:Even if they work at the airport,Don't mean they know all bout it!!!
Signing Up on Twitter, How exciting!!!
